scripts.clean: npm run clean-npm && npm run clean-android
scripts.clean-npm: npm cache clean -force && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.release-windows: echo USE THE SOLUTION FOR PUBLISHING
scripts.release: npm run release-android && npm run release-ios && npm run release-windows
scripts.release-ios: echo USE XCODE AD PUBLISH AN ARCHIVE
scripts.release-android: cd ./android && gradlew bundleRelease && gradlew assembleRelease && cd../
scripts.sign-android: cd android/app && keytool -genkeypair -v -storetype PKCS12 -keystore production.keystore -alias production -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 && cd ../../
